link_description: NOSA (Nubian Open Studios for the Arts) brings you the best of Roxbury's art and culture. Secure your Eventbrite tickets now and make it a moment to remember.

link_title: NOSA Artist of the Month Application 2024
link_description: At NOSA, we are dedicated to supporting and promoting talented artists from diverse backgrounds. Our Artist of the Month program is designed to provide exceptional artists with a platform to showcase their work, engage with the community, and gain recognition for their artistic endeavors.

By becoming a volunteer with NOSA, you have the opportunity to contribute your time, skills, and energy to meaningful projects that create lasting change. Our volunteer list is a diverse and inclusive network of individuals from various backgrounds, cultures, and professions, all united by a shared desire to make a difference.

Thank you for choosing NOSA! The only speak easy art gallery dedicated to serving the community. Please fill out this form to help us best serve you. Someone will be in contact with you within 1-2 business days.
